name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Whisk eggs in a bowl with a dash of soy sauce.
Heat sesame oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the chopped onion, carrots, and peas and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened.
Pour in the whisked eggs and scramble until cooked through.
Add the cooked rice to the wok, breaking up any clumps.
Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes until heated through.
Stir in the remaining soy sauce, salt, and pepper to taste.
